content.title: You can’t use desertion as your reason for divorce
content.reason: Your {{ divorceWho }} must have deserted you for at least 2 years for you to use it as your reason for divorce.
content.proceed: If you want to proceed with your divorce application, you must choose another fact which applies to you.

content.title: Ni allwch ddefnyddio’r ffaith fod eich gŵr/gwraig wedi gadael yn rheswm dros ysgaru
content.reason: Mae’n rhaid i’ch {{ divorceWho }} fod wedi eich gadael ers o leiaf 2 flynedd ichi ddefnyddio hynny’n rheswm dros ysgaru.
content.proceed: Os ydych am fwrw ymlaen gyda’ch cais am ysgariad, mae’n rhaid ichi ddewis ffaith arall sy’n berthnasol i chi.
